info.name: Dark Delaware Home Access Center
info.description:
The Delaware Home Access Center (HAC) is one of the most-visited websites by Delaware K12 students, because it allows students to see their assignments and class grade in real-time as educators update them.

Through a collaborative effort between my friend Ashish and I, we have created an alternate dark theme that is based off of the Google Material Design guidelines.
info.additionalInfo: This style changes the overall color scheme of the HAC, replaces the navigation bar images with icons from material-design, adds alternating colors to tables for improved readability, and changes the Caesar Rodney logo to a much more appealing version. Note that the logo will not change to the new Caesar Rodney logo if the student is not in the Caesar Rodney School District.
